page.title: 05 EDUCATION (cont.)
page.content: .... in the school. The deputy head doesn't think that the educational funds in London are too low.However the school has no space for Home Economics facilities and the school gym isn't in very good condition.Also the boys'take a coach to the playing fields in Edgware. "O" and "A" level results are very good and almost as good as in private schools which have a selective entry, that is,they take pupils of the highest ability.31 % of the pupils obtained 5 or more "O" levels. We interviewed two 4th Year boys (15 years old) .School for them starts at 8.50 am. and ends at 3.20 pm.There are two breaks,20 minutes nid-morning and one hour at lunchtime.They usually were given homework taking 1-3 hours.
